description:
A headless rider terrorizes the town on the anniversary of what was his death, seeking to decapitate people like himself. When the ghost turns his headlights upon Satsuki, the gang needs to find a way to put him to sleep again, and quick!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Kubi Nashi Rider!! Shi no Noroi
首なし ライダー!! 死の呪い
